00086 struct Range {
00087 
00090   Range() : min(0), max(0), inverted(false), pattern("") {}
00091 
00094   Range(int mn, int mx, int in, std::string p) : min(mn), max(mx), inverted(in), pattern(p) {}
00095 
00096   int min;
00097   int max;
00098   bool inverted;
00099   std::string pattern;
00100   bool every = true;
00101   bool none = false;
00102   
00103   bool isValid(int val) {
00104     if (every)
00105       return true;
00106     if (none)
00107       return true;
00108     if (!inverted)
00109       return (val >= min && val <= max);
00110     else
00111       return (val < min || val > max);
00112   }
00113 
00114   void parseRuleLine(std::string line);
00115 
00116   friend std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream &out, const Range &r);
00117 
00118   // set that this ranges accepts everything
00119   void setEvery() {
00120     every = true;
00121     none = false;
00122   }
00123 
00124   // set that this range accepts nothing
00125     void setNone() {
00126     every = false;
00127     none = true;
00128    }
00129   
00130   // return if this range accepts all values
00131   bool isEvery() const { return every; }
00132   
00133   // return if this range accepts no values
00134   bool isNone() const { return none; }
00135 
00136 
00137 };

00165     
00166     if (!f.isNA()) {
00167       bool val = (b->core.flag & bamflag);
00168       if ( (f.isOff() && val) || (f.isOn() && !val))

00173 
00174   Flag dup, supp, qcfail, hardclip, fwd_strand, rev_strand,
00175     mate_fwd_strand, mate_rev_strand, mapped, mate_mapped, ff, fr, rf, rr, ic;

00181   bool isValid(Read &r);

00184 
00185   // set every flag to NA (most permissive)
00186   void setEvery() {
00187     dup.setOn();
00188     supp.setOn();
00189     qcfail.setOn();
00190     hardclip.setOn();
00191     fwd_strand.setOn();
00192     rev_strand.setOn();
00193     mate_fwd_strand.setOn();
00194     mate_rev_strand.setOn();
00195     mapped.setOn();
00196     mate_mapped.setOn();
00197     ff.setOn();
00198     fr.setOn();
00199     rf.setOn();
00200     rr.setOn();
00201     ic.setOn();
00202     na = true;
00203   }
00204 
00205   // set every flag to OFF everythign off)
00206   void setNone() {
00207     dup.setOff();
00208     supp.setOff();
00209     qcfail.setOff();
00210     hardclip.setOff();
00211     fwd_strand.setOff();
00212     rev_strand.setOff();
00213     mate_fwd_strand.setOff();
00214     mate_rev_strand.setOff();
00215     mapped.setOff();
00216     mate_mapped.setOff();
00217     ff.setOff();
00218     fr.setOff();
00219     rf.setOff();
00220     rr.setOff();
00221     ic.setOff();
00222   }
00223 
00224 
00225   // ask if every flag is set to NA (most permissive)
00226   bool isEvery() const { return na; }

00264   //bool mate = false;

00283 
00284   void setEvery() {
00285     isize.setEvery();
00286     mapq.setEvery();
00287     len.setEvery();
00288     clip.setEvery();
00289     phred.setEvery();
00290     nm.setEvery();
00291     nbases.setEvery();
00292     fr.setEvery();
00293     atm_file = "";
00294     subsam_frac = 1;
00295   }
00296   
00297   void setNone() { 
00298     isize.setNone();
00299     mapq.setNone();
00300     len.setNone();
00301     clip.setNone();
00302     phred.setNone();
00303     nm.setNone();
00304     nbases.setNone();
00305     fr.setNone();
00306     none = true;
00307   }
00308 
00309   // return if this rule accepts all reads
00310   bool isEvery() const {
00311     return isize.isEvery() && mapq.isEvery() && len.isEvery() && clip.isEvery() && phred.isEvery() && nm.isEvery() && nbases.isEvery() && fr.isEvery() && (atm_file.length() == 0) && (subsam_frac >= 1);
00312   }
00313 
00314   // return if this rule accepts no reads
00315   bool isNone() const {
00316     return none;
00317     //return isize.isNone() && mapq.isNone() && len.isNone() && clip.isNone() && phred.isNone() && nm.isNone() && fr.isNone();
00318   }

00384 // a hierarchy of mini rules to operate on
00385 class MiniRulesCollection {
00386 
00387  public: 
00388   
00392   MiniRulesCollection() {}
00393 
00394   MiniRulesCollection(std::string file);
00395 
00396   std::string isValid(Read &r);
00397   
00398   friend std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& out, const MiniRulesCollection &mr);
00399   
00400   void sendToBed(std::string file);
00401 
00402   // check if we should do the whole genome
00403   bool hasWholeGenome() const {
00404     for (auto it : m_regions)
00405       if (it.m_whole_genome)
00406         return true;
00407     return false;
00408   }
00409 
00410   GRC getAllRegions() const;
00411 
00412   size_t size() const { return m_regions.size(); } 
00413 
00414   size_t numRules() const {
00415     size_t num = 0;
00416     for (auto& it : m_regions)
00417       num += it.size();
00418     return num;
00419   }
00420 
00421   std::vector<MiniRules> m_regions;
00422  private:
00423 
00424 
00425   
00426 };
